FuncDef:
The active bas command activates BAS on a board.
The undo active bas command deactivates BAS on a board.
By default, the BAS function is disabled on boards.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a board.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To allow a board that by default does not support BAS to support the access of Layer 2 and Layer 3 users, such as PPP, IPoE, L2TP, Layer 2 leased line, Layer 3 leased line users, run the active bas command to activate BAS on the board.
Prerequisites
The GTL license has been loaded, and the available license resources are adequate for boards' BAS functions.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
After BAS is deactivated on a board, all interfaces on this board and trunk interfaces that contain any interfaces on this board cannot have new access users.
This command applies only to the LPUF-120/LPUF-240/LPUI-120/LPUI-240/LPUI-402/LPUI-242/LPUI-52/LPUF-1TQ/LPUF-1TH/LPUF-53/LPUF-243/LPUF-483.
